member.name: T:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.AcuCobolInterface
member.summary: Provides methods for interfacing with AcuCobol data files, including record extraction.

member.name: M:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.AcuCobolInterface.ExtractRecords(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously extracts records from the specified AcuCobol data file. This method simulates the extraction process, which should involve invoking AcuCobol-specific utilities or libraries.
member.param: The file path to the AcuCobol data file.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation, containing a list of RecordModel objects.

member.name: T:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Logger
member.summary: Provides logging functionality for the application using Serilog.

member.name: M:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Logger.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the logger with specified configurations. Sets the minimum log level and specifies log outputs (console and file).

member.name: M:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Logger.LogMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an informational message to the log.

member.name: M:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Logger.LogError(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the log.

member.name: T:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Models.RecordModel
member.summary: Represents a single record extracted from the COBOL system. Adjust the properties to match the actual COBOL record structure.

member.name: P:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Models.RecordModel.RecordName
member.summary: Name or title of the record.

member.name: P:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Models.RecordModel.RecordData
member.summary: Main data of the record, this could represent a description, details, or content.

member.name: P:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Models.RecordModel.Metadata
member.summary: Additional metadata or attributes from the COBOL system.

member.name: T:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.PDFGenerator
member.summary: Provides methods for generating PDF documents from AcuCobol records.

member.name: M:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.PDFGenerator.GeneratePDFs(System.Collections.Generic.List{AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Models.RecordModel},System.String)
member.summary: Generates a PDF for each record in the provided list of records. Each PDF is saved in the specified output directory.
member.param: A list of objects to convert to PDF.
The directory to save the generated PDFs.

member.name: T:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Program
member.summary: Entry point for the AcuCobolToPDFConverter application.

member.name: M:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main method that starts the application.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.RecordProcessor
member.summary: Provides methods for processing AcuCobol records, including extraction and PDF conversion.

member.name: M:AcuCobolToPDFConverter.RecordProcessor.ExtractAndConvertRecords(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously extracts records from a specified file path and converts them to PDFs.
member.param: The path to the file containing AcuCobol records.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
